title: Afterlight v1.0.4 FULL
description:
===================================================================================
Name:      Afterlight
Version:   v1.0.4
Category:  Photo
Developer: Simon Filip
Price:     $0,99
===================================================================================
Afterlight is the perfect image editing app for quick and straight forward editing. Our simple design, paired with powerful and snappy tools, will give you the look you want in seconds.

How to install:
1. Have root on your device
2. Have installed the latest version of LuckyPatcher: <a href="
http://www.thepiratebay.se/torrent/9670108.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.thepiratebay.se/torrent/9670108.html</a>
3. Install Afterlight on your Android without then open the LuckyPatcher
4. In the LuckyPatcher, click on Menu and select Open Afterlight Patch 
5. Then select Remove License Verification (will be first on the list), select Automatic Modes, then Apply. 
6. CALM, is not yet ready, but this almost. Click again to Open Menu Patches only this time, select Create modified apk and then select Apk is rebuilded InApp and LVL emulation, like the image below
7. Leave the options checked, and Rebuild Application ! 
8. Then, go to where the application was created, can press the Go to file button, install this version and everything working .; 
9. Enjoy
